description: People planning to use the route to Guernsey must have travel insurance, the health minister says.
title: Isle of Man to Guernsey travellers told to check travel insurance
title_page: Isle of Man to Guernsey travellers told to check travel insurance - BBC News
maintext: Travellers who use the route to Guernsey, which opens on Wednesday, could be charged for everything from ambulance use to hospital food without the right cover, David Ashford said.
